isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - WINDSHIELD WIPERS (AIR) - ADJUSTMENT

svcproc.title: ADJUSTMENT
svcproc.para: When installing wiper arms, check the wiper arm adjustment on the windshield as follows:

step1.para: With vehicle air pressure registering at least 90 psi (620 kPa), note that wiper control knob is pushed in (PARK position).

Wiper arm should be installed on serrated driver so the blade will be within 3/4 to 1 inch (19 to 25 mm) and parallel to windshield lower seal ( Figure 82). This will prevent blade from running off left side of glass when operating at high speed and with a wet windshield.

figure.caption: Figure 82. Wiper Blade and Arm Adjustment
